definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: Critics say the dams are ecologically unsound white elephants.
sentences.chinese: 批評者說，大壩勞民傷財，又不利於生態環境。

definition: lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)
to assess one's income and spend accordingly (idiom); to live within one's means/You can only spend what you earn.
lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
One-China principle, the official doctrine that Taiwan is a province of China
delaying tactics/stalling/measures to stave off an attack/stratagem to win a respite
to judge between right and wrong/to reason things out
